content: After a complete re-setup of my mobile device, the zulip app reconnects every 2 seconds, so that working with it is almost impossible. I have no idea why. Hints are welcome. thx
@Tim Abbott FYI; not sure if this is a known issue. @Frank Oemig what OS are you using? Is it possible to describe your issue at https://github.com/zulip/zulip-mobile/issues ?
The funny thing is that I am using the same app on two devices with different behavior. So there must be a difference, but don't know where to look
